description.value:
The nature spirits you commune with protect you when you are the most defenseless. If you are reduced to 0 Hit Points or get the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition against your will, a number of Beasts, Fey and Plants are immediately summoned within unoccupied spaces within 20 feet of you. The Beasts, Fey and Plants summoned in this way can have a combined power of a level 9 spell slot.

For example, you can summon either a leve 5 version, along with two level 2 versions of Beasts, Fey or Plants.

If they receive no commands from you, they protect you from harm and attack your foes. The summoned Beasts, Fey or Plants lasts for 1 hour, requiring no Concentration, or until you dismiss it.

Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a Long Rest, unless you expend 3 uses of your Wild Shape to use it again.
